text:
Thank you Luke! I have just got the certification in GDD and GDD Agency on HubSpot Academy... :smile:
Also thank you for all that stuff! I found it awesomely interesting and usefull! :clap:
So far so good. Only issue i can see is no ability to mass delete/edit things without getting all api'ed. beyond that though everything has been fine.

yeah, we can definitely improve there <@UHGTV70FQ> - good thing is it's on our radar and we're exploring some new ideas. In the meantime, may be worth following/posting challenges in the <#CBZK16L9L|ftp-feedback> channel :slightly_smiling_face:
WOOT WOOT :beers::bmo: Congrats on completing the certifications!! great to hear you're investing in yourself and you found them helpful.
<@UH8EXSKSN> I'd reach out the the sales team to setup a 14 day trial. They can unlock all the tools you want for 14 days to play around with
ps. just got your email <@UHE8JR508> - I'll reply later on today :slightly_smiling_face:
Hello! My name is Yelena. I work for an inbound marketing agency and HubSpot partner. Looking forward to diving into the CMS for developers certification!

Greetings :spock-hand:My name is Guy. Getting up to speed across the HubSpot platform offering. Can't believe I didn't arrive here sooner...  here we are now. I am at TimeWave: <http://timewavemedia.com>
